name: First Step
description:
First Step

Done with Phaser 3.19.0

  • Localization
  • Customizable keyboard control
  • Scene change with stop or pause depending
  • Character state changes with modifications of animation and sound
  • Sprite vs Sprite collision
  • Sprite vs Zone overlap
  • Actions triggered by keyboard or mouse event
